pr_title: Fix for java.io.OptionalDataException that is caused by changes to User object after it is put on thread context.

timeline.message: Fix for java.io.OptionalDataException that is caused by changes to User object after it is put on thread context.

timeline.author: akbhatta

replies.bodyText: AFAIK, no. It is either set to injectedRoles if it is not null or output of mapRoles(user, caller) that may return empty set but never returns null.
replies.author: vrozov
